level.heading: Loans to mortgage lenders; requirements for reinvestment of proceeds by lender.
Legislative History of Law 2-135
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-135, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-28
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-28, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-118
level.text: Law 9-118, the "District of Columbia Government Employer-Assisted Housing Act of 1992," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-210, which was referred to the Committee on Housing. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 3, 1992, and April 7, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-192 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-118 became effective on June 11, 1992.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-110
level.text: Law 11-110, the "Technical Amendments Act of 1996," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-485, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 5, 1995, and January 4, 1996 respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 26, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-199 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-110 became effective on April 18, 1996.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-247
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.01.
